+email me

Hello, I'm a first year Computer Science student at the University of Toronto Scarborough Campus.

Big fan of mathematics, chess, game theory, responsive-design, programming and korean-bbq with the boys.


I have extensive experience in culinary arts/hospitality, photography, graphic design, music education and music performance, but as of recent, I've begun dabbling my feet in computer science and software.
Explore

Also im kind of good at piano but that's not very important :P

Skills:

Resume Here!

PROJECTS

H-Richard.me

A responsive Personal Website/Portfolio built from scratch to consolidate and demonstrate my front end skill growth.

Tech Stack: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Node, Jekyll, Ruby, Jade, Gulp

Check it out on GitHub!

minesweeper

A Hackathon Project built with-in 12 hours at UTSC Local Hack Day, the project has a game component and an AI-player component,

the game component is the classic minesweeper game that runs in your terminal.

the AI-player component is an algorithm that will play the game win.

Check it out on GitHub!

UTSC-NOTES

A public Notes repository dedicated to providing students at the University of Toronto Scarborough with a free & reliable source of Computer Science Notes.

Tech Stack: LaTeX, Jupyter Notebook, HTML/CSS, Python

Check it out on GitHub!

Experiences

Currently seeking meaningful ones.
